name: Friends of Sustainable Grids
memberOrga: Supergrid members include: ACS-Cobra, Aquind Interconnector, AXPO, Bernard Energy, Dii Desert Energy, Edison Electric Institute, ELES, Eunice Energy Group, Philippe & Partners, RTE-France, Sibelga, Supergrid Institute, Tideway, TuNur, WSP.
goal: Friends of Sustainable Grids (FOSG) is an international Brussels-based non-profit committed to transforming the way we look at sustainable energy grid infrastructure by focusing on Connecting all Energy Grids and Energy Education.
interests: Climate Action, Consumers, Education and training, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
"Clean Energy for All Europeans" Package
European Green Deal
EU Energy Union
2030 Energy and Climate Framework
Interconnection targets
PCI & TYNDP & CEF
EFSI, Innovation Fund
Horizon 2020, Horizon Europe
Energy Communities developments in the EU
Energy Poverty
Storage legislation and initiatives
Education initiatives with relation to energy and climate
